name: Santa's Last Stand - Team 8
description:
Fight to defend the last chritmas tree on earth against an overwheilming horode of zombie child ! Will manage to save christmas ?

Context : 

An ancient evil has turn most of the children into zombie and now they want to savagely and magic of christmas. Play as Santa and defend the last tree of christmas on earth ! Don't worry, your bullets won't kill them it will just free them from this evil. Well, I mean, in theory, they might be dead forever but uh.. we gotta believe in the christmas magic ya' know ?

Gameplay :

Play as Santa in this FPS tower defense. Exerce your right to bear arms and kill free zombies childs from their curse by using christmas miracles and Semi Automatic weapons. Use traps like mines, Ice Wall and turrets to defend your property and the christmas tree. Open gift in order to find traps that will reinforce your defense ! Fight against waves of monster and hold your ground until the end.

Will you be able to save christmas from all danger ?

           Features :

- Shoot zombie childs with your christmas gun.

- Place traps like mines, Ice Wall and turrets.

- Launch grenades against wave of ennemies.

- Loot Christmas gift and receive items that will help you. 

- Fight during 10 waves of ennemies.
